synopsis.text:
Eto-musume, divine entities embodying the traits of zodiac animals, have been protecting Japan for centuries. Every six decades, the prestigious ETM 12 tournament is held in Akihabara, Tokyo, where aspiring Eto-musume gather to compete for a chance to become one of the revered Eto-shin, the 12 divine messengers representing the zodiac signs. However, the current Eto-shin have remained undefeated for the past 2,000 years.

Enter Nya-tan, a cat Eto-musume with dreams of becoming an Eto-shin, but who has been consistently thwarted by cunning rodents. The path to becoming an Eto-shin is arduous, requiring victory over the existing 12 divine messengers, a feat considered nearly impossible due to their heavenly powers.

When Nya-tan crosses paths with Takeru Amato, an ordinary high school student, an extraordinary journey unfolds. Unbeknownst to Takeru, he possesses the unique ability to generate high-quality Sol/Lull, a divine energy derived from positive human emotions, which could provide Nya-tan with the power she needs to challenge the Eto-shin.

As Takeru and Nya-tan navigate their newfound alliance, they delve deeper into the world of the Eto-shin, uncovering hidden truths and battling against formidable adversaries. With the ETM 12 tournament fast approaching, Nya-tan's determination to secure her place among the zodiac signs intensifies, setting the stage for an epic showdown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
